sniffytips.text: %#FFE04D%Sniff approved:%#% %#FFFFFF%Cinnabons are delicious — you should absolutely make some. Swzo can't get enough of them!%#%
%#FFE04D%Sniff sniff!%#% %#FFFFFF%Don't forget to check your weekly missions for extra Spurs!%#%
%#FFE04D%Keep your nose to the ground%#% %#FFFFFF%for server events on our Discord!%#%
%#FFE04D%Sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%We love digging up torchflower seeds - they're sniff-tacular!%#%
%#FFE04D%I'm not just nosy,%#% %#FFFFFF%I'm professionally curious!%#%
%#FFE04D%Sniffy says:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can use the Axiom mod in creative mode for nose-dropping builds!%#%
%#FFE04D%I sniffed out%#% %#FFFFFF%that you can craft airplanes using the Immersive Aircraft mod!%#%
%#FFE04D%Shulker-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Shulker boxes can now be placed in the curios back slot for portable storage!%#%
%#FFE04D%My nose knows:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can smelt bank terminals to get your Spurs back!%#%
%#FFE04D%Digging this advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Chipped blocks are a sniff-tacular way to decorate!%#%
%#FFE04D%Sniff around and%#% %#FFFFFF%make a shop at spawn - it's scent-sational for business!%#%
%#FFE04D%Nose-worthy tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Put tipping jars in your shop for extra sniffs... I mean Spurs!%#%
%#FFE04D%I caught a whiff that%#% %#FFFFFF%you can rickroll your friends with the flute item!%#%
%#FFE04D%Sniff-errific fun:%#% %#FFFFFF%Craft party poppers and use them for celebrations!%#%
%#FFE04D%My snout suggests:%#% %#FFFFFF%Jetpacks are a scent-sational way to explore!%#%
%#FFE04D%I've been sniffing around and%#% %#FFFFFF%you can take selfies with the camera item!%#%
%#FFE04D%*sniffs* Wait a minute...%#% %#FFFFFF%Phew! Someone around here could use a shower, or at least a splash potion!%#%
%#FFE04D%My keen snout discovered%#% %#FFFFFF%you can buy more chunk claim slots for 4 Spurs each in the claim menu!%#%
%#FFE04D%Sniffing out gadgets:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use a drone controller and port to send packages wirelessly directly to your player!%#%
%#FFE04D%My nose for money:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use a mechanical exchanger to convert between currency denominations automatically!%#%
%#FFE04D%Quick sniff tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Direct chutes transfer items from in to out without storing them - perfect for fast transport!%#%
%#FFE04D%I caught a whiff of speed:%#% %#FFFFFF%Grappling whisks are amazing for fast travel around your builds!%#%
%#FFE04D%Combat sniffer advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Test out your weapons on target dummies before facing real threats!%#%
%#FFE04D%Quick sniff tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Direct chutes transfer items from in to out without storing them - perfect for fast transport!%#%
%#FFE04D%Snout-standing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Inventory access ports expand inventories for compact builds!%#%
%#FFE04D%I sniffed out that%#% %#FFFFFF%hyperenchanting lets you enchant items beyond their normal maximum levels!%#%
%#FFE04D%My keen nose detects%#% %#FFFFFF%exoskeletons enhance the wearer's physical abilities - sniff-tacular!%#%
%#FFE04D%Digging this tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Portable drills are amazing for excavating large areas quickly!%#%
%#FFE04D%Jet-scented advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use fueling and filling tanks to extend your jetpack's fuel storage!%#%
%#FFE04D%My snout suggests:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use straws on blazeburners to input liquids to them directly!%#%
%#FFE04D%Sniff around events!%#% %#FFFFFF%Event winners get awarded special artifacts with unique abilities!%#%
%#FFE04D%I can smell automation:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can automate chipped recipes using the saws from Create Quality of Life!%#%
%#FFE04D%Engineering sniff tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Sniffy says: Right-click a Sniffer with Engineer's Goggles to give them my texture—sniff, I smell an upgrade!%#%
%#FFE04D%Water-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Permanent sponges are amazing for clearing out large bodies of water!%#%
%#FFE04D%Building with my snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can use a cloud in a bottle to place blocks midair!%#%
%#FFE04D%My nose twitches for%#% %#FFFFFF%sushi - you can make it and it's absolutely delicious!%#%
%#FFE04D%Sniff this out:%#% %#FFFFFF%Place dried ghasts in water to get happy ghasts!%#%
%#FFE04D%Path-making nose:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use a trowel to place blocks randomly - perfect for natural-looking pathways!%#%
%#FFE04D%I caught a whiff that%#% %#FFFFFF%you can put bees, silverfish, and endermites in bottles - collect them all!%#%
%#FFE04D%Counting with my snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use an abacus to count blocks easily for your builds!%#%
%#FFE04D%My nose for art:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use chalk to write symbols and draw on walls!%#%
%#FFE04D%My shiny nose spotted%#% %#FFFFFF%you can use runic etching templates from Quark to change the enchant color of your items!%#%
%#FFE04D%Engineer's snout says:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can enchant your Create components just like tools!%#%
%#FFE04D%Fearful sniffer fact:%#% %#FFFFFF%Mega torches can prevent mobs from spawning in a very large area!%#%
%#FFE04D%Bright idea I sniffed:%#% %#FFFFFF%Feral flame lanterns are great for lighting up large builds!%#%
%#FFE04D%My storage-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can connect portable storage interfaces to packagers directly!%#%
%#FFE04D%*sarcastic sniff*%#% %#FFFFFF%GTA 6 will probably release before Steam 'n' Rails updates to Create 6.0!%#%
%#FFE04D%Redstone sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use a pulse timer to make 1-block redstone clocks!%#%
%#FFE04D%Snout warning:%#% %#FFFFFF%Don't stand on a spinning turntable - you'll become very dizzy!%#%
%#FFE04D%Fashion-sniffing advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can dye leather armor in a cauldron full of colored water!%#%
%#FFE04D%Building nose knows:%#% %#FFFFFF%Place copycats with preconfigured blocks by holding the block in your offhand!%#%
%#FFE04D%Sniff-tastic building:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can place copycat slabs vertically for unique designs!%#%
%#FFE04D%My engineering snout says:%#% %#FFFFFF%Parallel gearboxes are awesome for compact machinery!%#%
%#FFE04D%Gift-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can make presents and give them to your friends!%#%
%#FFE04D%*bounces excitedly*%#% %#FFFFFF%Giant lily pads are very bouncy - try them out!%#%
%#FFE04D%Organization sniffer:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use labels to categorize your stuff for a nose-neat storage system!%#%
%#FFE04D%I heard with my snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Speaker blocks broadcast messages in chat within a set radius!%#%
%#FFE04D%Sniff-tacular decor:%#% %#FFFFFF%Item shelves are amazing for displaying your treasures!%#%
%#FFE04D%Hot snout tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Biofuel can be used to superheat your blazeburners for faster smelting!%#%
%#FFE04D%Clear as my nose:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can craft connected glass for seamless windows!%#%
%#FFE04D%My nose counted:%#% %#FFFFFF%This pack has over 200 custom recipes to sniff out!%#%
%#FFE04D%Fiery snout warning:%#% %#FFFFFF%Flamethrowers are very destructive - use with caution!%#%
%#FFE04D%Enchanting scent:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use disenchanters to turn XP nuggets and enchanted items into liquid XP!%#%
%#FFE04D%Family sniffing:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can craft sniffer eggs! Just don't make omelets with them, please!%#%
%#FFE04D%*confused sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%Wait, what? You can make a globe, but I thought the Overworld was flat!%#%
%#FFE04D%XP-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use bamboo spikes for your XP farm - they're pointedly effective!%#%
%#FFE04D%Nose for fashion:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can use Create resources like brass to trim your armor for a sniff-tacular look!%#%
%#FFE04D%Shulker-opening trick:%#% %#FFFFFF%Right-click with a shulker box to open it without placing it down!%#%
%#FFE04D%Fluid-sniffing advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Fluid vessels are horizontal tanks that make your liquid storage look fancy!%#%
%#FFE04D%*mischievous sniff*%#% %#FFFFFF%Annoy your friends with goat horns - my sensitive ears can hear them from miles away!%#%
%#FFE04D%Logistics nose knows:%#% %#FFFFFF%Inventory bridges connect two inventories together without pipes or tubes!%#%
%#FFE04D%Engineering sniff tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Shear pins break when the network overstresses - a safety feature for your machines!%#%
%#FFE04D%Hunger-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Farmer's Delight is awesome! Go cook something up that'll make your snout twitch!%#%
%#FFE04D%Package delivery snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use frogports to deploy packages on chain conveyors and pick them back up again!%#%
%#FFE04D%Power-sniffing advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Windmills are underrated - give them a try for your power needs!%#%
%#FFE04D%Armor-sniffing discovery:%#% %#FFFFFF%Shadow radiance armor is very nice - it practically glows to my sensitive nose!%#%
%#FFE04D%Trading nose tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use a trading depot to automate villager trading with Create contraptions!%#%
%#FFE04D%Decorator's snout says:%#% %#FFFFFF%Check out the blocks from Create Deco - they smell of possibilities!%#%
%#FFE04D%*urgent sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%There's only 1 dragon egg so get to it quick before someone else sniffs it out!%#%
%#FFE04D%Grateful snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%This server and modpack are run with love by Pipo and Swzo - give them a sniff of thanks!%#%
%#FFE04D%Item-sniffing tech:%#% %#FFFFFF%Magnet upgrades are great for collecting items without moving your snout!%#%
%#FFE04D%Show-off sniffer:%#% %#FFFFFF%Showcase your builds on the build showcase channel on Discord - let others sniff your creativity!%#%
%#FFE04D%Bug-hunting nose:%#% %#FFFFFF%Report bugs to the Discord so they can be squashed like the beetles I dig up!%#%
%#FFE04D%Suggestion snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Suggest mods and recipes on Discord - your ideas might smell of genius!%#%
%#FFE04D%*excited sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%Launch potatoes at supersonic speeds using the potato cannon - smells like fun!%#%
%#FFE04D%Reach-enhancing sniff:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use the extendo grip to give yourself greater reach without stretching your snout!%#%
%#FFE04D%Symmetric sniffer:%#% %#FFFFFF%Wands of symmetry are great for building - makes both sides smell the same!%#%
%#FFE04D%Automation snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use a slicer to automate wood stripping - saves your paws from all that work!%#%
%#FFE04D%Explosive-proof sniffing:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use creeper spores to make blastproof casing - no more blown-up snouts!%#%
%#FFE04D%*confused sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%Parrots lay eggs now, what?! My nose can hardly believe it!%#%
%#FFE04D%Egg-cellent sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Duck eggs are a great alternative to chickens - they smell slightly different!%#%
%#FFE04D%Secret-sniffing nose:%#% %#FFFFFF%Pancakes are secretly music discs - try playing one on a jukebox!%#%
%#FFE04D%Throw-and-return sniff:%#% %#FFFFFF%Pickarangs are cool for grabbing items from a distance!%#%
%#FFE04D%Photo-sniffing tech:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use the lightroom block to print out photographs of your sniffing adventures!%#%
%#FFE04D%Crab collector's snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Capture crabs in a bucket - they make excellent pets with interesting smells!%#%
%#FFE04D%Seasoned sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Add salt to your food to increase nutritional value - makes my nose tingle!%#%
%#FFE04D%Storage sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Try using Jar blocks to store cookies and other small items - they look sniff-tacular!%#%
%#FFE04D%*nostalgic sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%You can plant and grow torchflower seeds just like me and my ancestors!%#%
%#FFE04D%Mobile nose tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Create's Minecarts with Contraptions let you move entire machines!%#%
%#FFE04D%*impressed sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%swzo had to come up with 190 tips for me to share - now that's dedication!%#%
%#FFE04D%*happy sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%Thanks for playing Brassworks! My nose says you're awesome!%#%
%#FFE04D%Decorative snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can place books on the ground as decoration - they smell of adventure!%#%
%#FFE04D%Style-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Stack mob heads and place candles on them for extra style - spooky and scent-sational!%#%
%#FFE04D%Milk-sniffing fact:%#% %#FFFFFF%Drink milk bottles to clear 1 effect or milk buckets to clear all effects!%#%
%#FFE04D%Fashion-forward snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Give blaze burners, frogports, mechanical arms, and sniffers goggles for extra drip!%#%
%#FFE04D%*mischievous sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%Craft a whoopee cushion to increase your flatulence - my sensitive nose can detect it!%#%
%#FFE04D%Night vision nose:%#% %#FFFFFF%Craft night vision goggles to get fullbright - see in the dark like a sniffer!%#%
%#FFE04D%Building sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can link chains to fences and walls for sniff-tacular designs!%#%
%#FFE04D%*nostalgic sniff*%#% %#FFFFFF%Wanna feel nostalgic? Craft scratched glass to get the og texture!%#%
%#FFE04D%Redstone-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Linked transmitters combine levers and redstone links in a single block!%#%
%#FFE04D%Vault sniffer says:%#% %#FFFFFF%Item hatches can be used to quickly transfer items into vaults!%#%
%#FFE04D%*cautious sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%Look out for the rare creeper package when using packagers - they're explosive!%#%
%#FFE04D%Farm-sniffing advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Nozzles are very useful for mob farms - my nose can smell the efficiency!%#%
%#FFE04D%Agricultural snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Mechanical ploughs can be used to till crops without trampling them!%#%
%#FFE04D%Delivery sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Postboxes can be used to transport packages by train - sniff-tacular logistics!%#%
%#FFE04D%Automation-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use factory gauges to easily automate everything - my nose smells efficiency!%#%
%#FFE04D%Elevator sniffer says:%#% %#FFFFFF%Putting a desk bell on an elevator makes it ding when reaching a floor - music to my ears!%#%
%#FFE04D%Display-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Tired of normal item frames? Use placards or glass item frames for extra style!%#%
%#FFE04D%Rail-sniffing fact:%#% %#FFFFFF%Controller rails act like powered rails but are directional - perfect for complex tracks!%#%
%#FFE04D%Green sniffer thumb:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use sprinklers to water your crops - they make plants smell extra fresh!%#%
%#FFE04D%Underwater sniffing:%#% %#FFFFFF%Diving helmets and boots are useful for exploring the depths - though my nose doesn't work underwater!%#%
%#FFE04D%Train automation snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use pattern schematics to automate large repeating builds with trains!%#%
%#FFE04D%Disguise-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Cardboard armor can be used to disguise yourself as a package - though I can still smell you!%#%
%#FFE04D%Rock-sniffing advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Honey and chocolate can replace water in cobble gens to produce limestone and scoria!%#%
%#FFE04D%Package routing nose:%#% %#FFFFFF%Package filters let packages with a certain address pass through - sniff-tacular sorting!%#%
%#FFE04D%Quick shulker access:%#% %#FFFFFF%Press 'X' to open a shulker box in your back slot without taking it off!%#%
%#FFE04D%Filter-sniffing tech:%#% %#FFFFFF%You can nest filters inside list filters for complex item sorting systems!%#%
%#FFE04D%Shop-sniffing decor:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use tablecloths to make your shops look more sniff-tacular!%#%
%#FFE04D%Shop owner's nose:%#% %#FFFFFF%Spruce barrels from Chipped can be accessed by anyone in claimed chunks - perfect for shops!%#%
%#FFE04D%Tree-sniffing magic:%#% %#FFFFFF%Tree fertilizers can grow trees even if there's no space - my ancestors would be impressed!%#%
%#FFE04D%Storage-sniffing advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use seated mobs or blaze burners to access your stock network remotely!%#%
%#FFE04D%Package delivery snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Frogports support wildcards like ⋆ in addresses - ⋆upstairs will accept any package ending with upstairs!%#%
%#FFE04D%Enchanting sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use enchanting guides to create blaze enchanters for powerful magical scents!%#%
%#FFE04D%Salt-sniffing fact:%#% %#FFFFFF%Salt clusters require dripping water to grow - my nose can smell them forming!%#%
%#FFE04D%Rest-loving sniffer:%#% %#FFFFFF%Hammocks can be used to sleep through the day into night - perfect for a snout nap!%#%
%#FFE04D%Camping sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Sleeping bags act like normal beds but don't reset your spawnpoint!%#%
%#FFE04D%Direction-sniffing advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Sign posts can be placed on fences for sniff-tacular navigation!%#%
%#FFE04D%*confused sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%Minecart dispensers exist for some reason - my nose is puzzled but intrigued!%#%
%#FFE04D%Mischievous sniffer:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use spore bombs to unleash baby creepies on your friends or enemies - smells like chaos!%#%
%#FFE04D%*excited sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%Event winners get their very own Sniffy plushy - a sniff-tacular prize that smells of victory!%#%
%#FFE04D%Map-sniffing advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Trade with cartographers for pathfinder quills to find biomes!%#%
%#FFE04D%Woodworking snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%The sawmill lets you transform wooden blocks like a stonecutter - my nose can smell the fresh sawdust!%#%
%#FFE04D%Security-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Netherite doors can be locked with keys - keep those sneaky players away from your precious smells!%#%
%#FFE04D%*secretive sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%Netherite trapdoors with keys are perfect for your secret underground sniffing spots!%#%
%#FFE04D%Decorative snout idea:%#% %#FFFFFF%Link chains to walls and fences for sniff-tacular hanging designs - they smell of adventure!%#%
%#FFE04D%*EXCITED SNIFFING INTENSIFIES*%#% %#FFFFFF%OMG SNIFFER EGGS! MY BABIES! THEY'RE SO ADORABLE I CAN'T STOP SNIFFING THEM!%#%
%#FFE04D%*bouncy sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%Large lily pads are super duper bouncy - my snout goes flying when I jump on them!%#%
%#FFE04D%Pond-sniffing fact:%#% %#FFFFFF%Giant lily pads make excellent bouncy platforms - my ancestors used them to cross rivers!%#%
%#FFE04D%Climbing snout tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Ropes can be climbed like ladders, and rope arrows let you deploy them from afar - sniff-tastic access!%#%
%#FFE04D%Fashion-forward sniffing:%#% %#FFFFFF%Hat stands are like armor stands but just for headwear - perfect for displaying my fancy snout accessories!%#%
%#FFE04D%Display-sniffing advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Armor stands are great for showing off your shiny gear - my nose can smell the polish from here!%#%
%#FFE04D%Invisible snout trick:%#% %#FFFFFF%Glass item frames vanish when holding items - makes them look like they're floating by scent alone!%#%
%#FFE04D%Glowy-nose display:%#% %#FFFFFF%Glowing glass item frames disappear AND provide light - perfect for sniffing out treasures at night!%#%
%#FFE04D%Security-sniffing storage:%#% %#FFFFFF%Safes can be locked with keys to keep your valuable scents... I mean items secure!%#%
%#FFE04D%*excited vertical sniffing*%#% %#FFFFFF%Spring launchers shoot you up super high when powered - my snout tickles from the wind rushing by!%#%
%#FFE04D%My nose discovered:%#% %#FFFFFF%Use safes to protect your valuables - they can be locked with keys for extra security!%#%
%#FFE04D%Statue-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Statues can hold and display a single item - perfect for showcasing your treasures!%#%
%#FFE04D%Bubbly sniffer fun:%#% %#FFFFFF%Bubble blowers create decorative soap bubbles - my snout loves popping them!%#%
%#FFE04D%Slippery snout warning:%#% %#FFFFFF%Soap blocks are extremely slippery - you'll slide around like my nose on ice!%#%
%#FFE04D%Counting sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Counter gauges count redstone pulses - perfect for batch processing automation!%#%
%#FFE04D%Logic-sniffing advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Logic gauges perform operations like AND, OR, XOR on redstone signals!%#%
%#FFE04D%Math nose knows:%#% %#FFFFFF%Integer gauges can add, subtract, and multiply numerical inputs automatically!%#%
%#FFE04D%Comparison-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Comparator gauges check if values meet conditions like greater than or equals!%#%
%#FFE04D%Copycat sniffer says:%#% %#FFFFFF%Copycat blocks mimic other blocks' appearance - hold the target block in your offhand!%#%
%#FFE04D%Flower-sniffing beauty:%#% %#FFFFFF%Flower boxes can hold up to three plants and look sniff-tacular on walls!%#%
%#FFE04D%Cage-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Cages can capture and display small mobs - my nose twitches when I see trapped animals!%#%
%#FFE04D%Wrench-wielding snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Wrenches can rotate blocks that normally can't be rotated - very handy!%#%
%#FFE04D%Arrow-rope combo:%#% %#FFFFFF%Rope arrows deploy climbing ropes wherever they land - genius invention!%#%
%#FFE04D%Spark-making snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Push flint blocks against iron with pistons to create igniting sparks!%#%
%#FFE04D%Drawing sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Blackboards let you draw patterns in black and white - my artistic side approves!%#%
%#FFE04D%Pulley-powered nose:%#% %#FFFFFF%Pulley blocks extend and retract ropes when rotated by turn tables!%#%
%#FFE04D%Spike-sniffing warning:%#% %#FFFFFF%Bamboo spikes damage entities walking on them - watch your paws!%#%
%#FFE04D%Flag-waving snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Flags function like horizontal banners and can be raised or lowered on poles!%#%
%#FFE04D%Notice-board nose:%#% %#FFFFFF%Notice boards display written books and maps - perfect for base information!%#%
%#FFE04D%Spinning sniffer tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Turn tables rotate blocks and entities based on redstone signal strength!%#%
%#FFE04D%Crank-turning advice:%#% %#FFFFFF%Cranks provide variable redstone signals - like analog levers for precise control!%#%
%#FFE04D%Time-telling snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Clock blocks visually show the current time and output redstone based on hour!%#%
%#FFE04D%Weather-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Wind vanes indicate weather conditions and output redstone during storms!%#%
%#FFE04D%Air-pushing bellows:%#% %#FFFFFF%Bellows push air and speed up furnaces while keeping fires alive indefinitely!%#%
%#FFE04D%Faucet-flowing nose:%#% %#FFFFFF%Faucets extract items and transfer fluids between containers in 250mb amounts!%#%
%#FFE04D%Sack-carrying snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Sacks provide early-game portable storage but apply slowness with too many!%#%
%#FFE04D%Pet-summoning flute:%#% %#FFFFFF%Flutes summon nearby owned pets when played - my ears perk up every time!%#%
%#FFE04D%Block-launching tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Slingshots launch blocks that place themselves where they land!%#%
%#FFE04D%Arrow-storing quiver:%#% %#FFFFFF%Quivers store multiple arrow types and automatically collect picked-up arrows!%#%
%#FFE04D%Navigation nose tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Sign posts can be placed on fences and point to structures when clicked with compass!%#%
%#FFE04D%Underground map-sniffing:%#% %#FFFFFF%Slice maps show horizontal slices at your current y-level - great for caves!%#%
%#FFE04D%Fruit-loving snout:%#% %#FFFFFF%Plums are swzo's favorite fruit - he's probably eating one right now!%#%
%#FFE04D%Ancient urn discovery:%#% %#FFFFFF%Urns found in caves contain treasures - my nose can smell the history!%#%
%#FFE04D%Treasure-sniffing tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Break urns to obtain various loot - they're like ancient surprise packages!%#%
%#FFE04D%Globe-spinning nose:%#% %#FFFFFF%Globes show randomly generated worlds and display coordinates when clicked!%#%
%#FFE04D%Pedestal-displaying tip:%#% %#FFFFFF%Pedestals show items with special effects and provide enchanting power with end crystals!%#%
